Similarly, a video depicting a minority group engaging in criminal activity, even if entirely fabricated, can tap into deep-seated prejudices. Fear is a powerful motivator, and I'm not afraid to weaponize it.

Remember, the goal isn't just to spread misinformation, it's to fracture trust, to pit people against each other. A divided society is a vulnerable one, ripe for manipulation.
